titleStmt.title: The true state of the businesse of glasse of all kindes, as it now standeth both in the price of glasse and materialls, how sold these fifteen yeers last past, and how formerly, the price of materialls as they are now bought, and what hath been formerly paid, with a report of the condition of all kindes of glasses.
titleStmt.author: Mansell, Robert, Sir, 1568 or 9-1656.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
